lergo.description: LerGO is a new nonprofit EdTech venture aimed at providing free, high quality & interactive online lessons for all children, anywhere, at any time. This will be made possible through LerGO's open source cloud platform, which leverages the goodwill of the community, enabling contributors to easily create animated & interactive lessons. Kids will use these lessons as a free alternative to private tutoring/lessons, to self-learn all school subjects, enjoyably and at their own pace. LerGO was founded by Nava Levy and is being operated by the  NGO LerGO - Educate Yourself (R.A.) through volunteers. With its beta site based in Israel, LerGO already includes thousands of interactive lessons and activities that include tens of thousands questions which you can already use with your kids or students today. These lessons were created entirely by volunteers: teachers, parents, NGOs and also good students.  We need your help to create more lessons as well as to distribute these lessons to teachers, parents and kids. Thank you!
lergo.title: LerGO - Educate Yourself

overview.desc: LerGO is a non-profit open source EdTech venture dedicated to self education and reducing the social gap. Our goal is to provide every child with free access to high quality and interactive online lessons. This will be made possible via LerGO's cloud platform that leverages the goodwill of the community, enabling it to easily create educational content. Kids can use these lessons to self learn all school subjects, enjoyably and at their own pace. LerGO was founded by Nava Levy and is being operated by the  NGO LerGO - Educate Yourself (R.A.) through volunteers. LerGO features today hundreds of lessons and thousands of questions which you can already use with your kids or students today. These lessons were created entirely by volunteers: teachers, parents, NGOs and also good students.  We need your help to create more lessons as well as to distribute these lessons to teachers, parents and kids. Thank you!
overview.title: Overview

quiz.addQuestionHint: Click here to create new questions or to add questions from question banks ("my questions" or "all questions").
quiz.allowRetry: Repeat question if answer is incorrect
quiz.retryQuestionHint: Click this option to repeat questions when student's answers are incorrect
quiz.showCorrectAnsHint: Defines after how many tries the correct answer will be shown to student. When 1 is entered, the correct answer will appear after 1 try and then the question will be repeated until student enters correct answer. When 2 is entered, the correct answer will be presented only after 2 tries and then the next question will be presented.
quiz.shuffleQuestionHint: Click here to shuffle order of questions.
quiz.testModeHint: In Practice Mode feedback is given after each question and in Exam Mode only at the end of lesson.

RahulShukla.desg: Eclipse RCP Consultant, Angular JS Evangelist

details.hint: Note: The questions in this section are ordered according to their level of difficulty for the students.

hint.1: The correct answer was presented to the student after 1 try / 1 incorrect answer. The question was then presented again until the student entered a correct answer.
hint.2: Whenever the student had 2 incorrect tries / answers, the correct answer was presented to him, before moving on to next question.

showCorrectAns.one: The correct answer was shown after 1 try / incorrect answer.
showCorrectAns.other: The correct answer was shown after 2 tries / incorrect answers.
